LanguageData.MI_Message_BrainDamageTreatment_HediffRe: Treatment of {PAWN_labelShort}'s {HEDIFF} has finished. The patient has fully recovered from the condition.
LanguageData.MI_Message_BrainDamageTreatment_HediffSe: Treatment of {PAWN_labelShort}'s {HEDIFF} has finished. The sevity of the condition has beed reduced by {PERCENT}%.
